name: The Shadow Over Route 80
description:
Somewhere, deep in the American wheat belt, a shadow looms.
Are you sure you're alone?




You're working at a petrol station in the middle of nowhere. It's late at night, nobody else around. Something feels off.
You ignore that feeling and continue with your tasks.A car pulls up and honks, beckoning you to come over.
You can feel the creeping dread surround you, but you try to ignore it...

A short 10-15 minute horror game with multiple endings.
